    • Method Detail

      • checkSymbols

        public static boolean checkSymbols(ListSymbols symbols)
        Checks whether or not the given list is compatible with this turtle. If there is an interpretation that is unknown, returns false. Undefined interpretations are accepted
        Parameters:
        symbols - the list to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the interpretation is OK, false if this turtle can't represent the list

      • checkSymbols

        public boolean checkSymbols()
        Description copied from class: Turtle
        Checks if the interpretation can interpret all the symbols.
        Specified by:
        checkSymbols in class Turtle
        Returns:
        true if all is ok, false if all symbols can't be interpreted
